name: ai-sloppy-paste
title: AI Sloppy Paste
description: A simple text database for storing and quickly pasting text snippets with categories and search
author: sglavoie

preferences.name: maxPlaceholderHistoryValues
preferences.title: Max Placeholder History Values
preferences.description: Maximum number of values to display in dropdown (storage keeps up to 100 values to prevent data loss)

preferences.name: clipboardRestoreDelay
preferences.title: Clipboard Restore Delay
preferences.description: How long to wait before restoring the original clipboard after pasting a snippet. Increase if the wrong content is pasted. Set to 'Never' to skip restoration entirely.

commands.name: index
commands.title: Manage Snippets
commands.description: View, search, and manage your text snippets

commands.name: save-clipboard
commands.title: Save Clipboard as Snippet
commands.description: Quickly save the current clipboard content as a new snippet

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
